IK in Pskov is the news of Pskov and Pskov province. Large trials, details of accidents, changes in bus schedules. To recognize the weather in Pscove and the Great Lukas, to read about corruption scandals, reports, to see the results of the Pskov-747 and Lucky Energy football clubs. On the website, the readers will find the cost of the apartment in the city, the popular vacancies and how much they pay for work in Pscove.
